overview:
Harsh Sinha is a Performance Engineer and Developer with experience working for large scale Internet companies as well as assisting and acting as an advisor to several early stage start-ups.

He is an entrepreneur by nature and enjoys focusing on companies that can provide a real social or charitable impact in the world. He is passionate about not simply lending a hand but teaching others to assist themselves through programs like education and micro-finance.

Harsh is currently employed by eBay, Inc. where he placed in the Skunkworks ‘09 development competition and is a critical component to their performance engineering team.
